title: What Does It Take for an Indie Skin-Care Brand to Expand Into Fragrance?
description: As indie beauty brands work to grow their businesses and broaden their communities, it's only natural that they'd expand into new product categories. Fine fragrance, in particular, is one that's proving to be quite popular at the moment. Glossier, for instance, saw so much success with its ...Continue reading
author: Steph Saltzman
